tool.name: In-Silico Labeling - Predicting
tool.description: This interface sends Unix commands to run In-Silico Labeling TensorFlow program (Christiansen et al 2018). There are two modes: Predicting and Training. This one is for Predicting.

param.name: crop_size
param.label: Select Crop Size between 285 and 1500.
param.help: The default value is 1500. One can chose smaller value like 375 for faster processing.

param.name: model_location
param.label: Specify path to model.
param.help: The default value is ISL model: /finkbeiner/imaging/home/in-silico/in-silico-labeling/isl/checkpoints.

param.name: output_path
param.label: Specify path for the output, where the predicted images will be saved.

param.name: dataset_eval_path
param.label: Specify path for the dataset, where the images to be analyzed are located.

param.name: infer_channels
param.label: Specify Inference Channels
param.help: If images are confocal for survival tracking choose DAPI_CONFOCAL,CELLMASK_CONFOCAL,DEAD_CONFOCAL or for all other uses choose DAPI_CONFOCAL, MAP2_CONFOCAL,NFH_CONFOCAL. But if images are widefield choose DAPI_WIDEFIELD, TUJ1_WIDEFIELD, ISLET_WIDEFIELD
